message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great opportunity to purchase my product. Considering its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $11,000.

I appreciate your time and consideration, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $9,000 is considerably less than what I'm willing to accept.  How about we meet in the middle at $10,000?

I appreciate the compromise, Alice, but I'm still a bit above $9,000. How about we meet in the middle of my original offer and your last one, at $9,500? I'm willing to pay a bit more, but I need to stay within my budget.
